summary: The video features a man with long dark hair and a beard, wearing a white t-shirt, lying back on a couch. He appears to be contemplating something and discussing a repetitive issue he is experiencing.
screenContent: The screen shows a close-up of a man with dark hair and a beard, wearing a white t-shirt. He is lying back on a couch with soft, gray cushions. The background wall is a muted beige color. The lighting is somewhat dim, accentuating the details of his face and beard.
actions: The man is lying back on a couch, resting his chin on his hand as he looks around and speaks. He is clearly thinking and talking about a problem.

transcript.text: So, I'm getting like a repetitive thing going on. I'm not sure what exactly it is, but um, I don't know.
